Page.Text:
1. No slashes before commands, one command per line. \#5ADD22MYSELF \#BBBBBBis a variable for your own name. \#5ADD22SELECTED\#BBBBBB is a variable for targeted group/raid member. \#FFFFFF 2. Spells with an apostrophe need to be wrapped in quotes: \#BBBBBBuseabilityonplayer SELECTED "Ro's Fire"\#FFFFFF
3. Wrap words with an apostrophe or special characters in quotes: \#BBBBBBtell SELECTED "You're getting a death save"\#FFFFFF \#BBBBBBgsay Death save on SELECTED"!!"\#FFFFFF
Do \#FF6666NOT \#FFFFFFuse quotes as normal text. Quotes cannot surround the variables.

Page.Text:
1. Ability name does \#FF6666NOT\#FFFFFF need to be wrapped in quotes: \#BBBBBBExample: You're On Your Own!\#FFFFFF
2. No slashes before commands, one command per line. \#5ADD22MYSPELL \#BBBBBBis a variable for the ability name. \#5ADD22MYTARGET\#BBBBBB is a variable for current target's name.\#FFFFFF
3. Macro input \#FF6666REQUIRES\#FFFFFF aspotrophes/special chars in quotes: \#BBBBBBgsay "We're all getting saved from death"\#FFFFFF
4. Don't wrap variables with quotes. \#BBBBBBgsay "Curing curse on" MYTARGET\#FFFFFF
Instant cast abilities are supported. Instant cast abilities that can be casted while another ability is casting are \#FF6666NOT\#FFFFFF supported.
Setup macros to be used when an ability is cast. Settings are Character-specific.

Button.Name: SetupLoop
Button.OnShow: Parent.DoCommand.onpress=("bCheck=Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Casting.UserSettings." ## iCount ## ".cmdText == Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Casting.UserSettings." ## iCount ## ".defCmdText") Parent.DoCommand.press=true Parent.DoCommand.onpress=("Parent.Options." ## iCount ## ".Name.text=bCheck ? ' ' : Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Casting.UserSettings." ## iCount ## ".cmdText") Parent.DoCommand.press=true iCount=(iCount + 1) Visible=false
Button.OnxHide: bCheck=(iCount > 50) iCount=(bCheck ? 1 : iCount) Visible=(bCheck ? false : true)

Page.Text:
1. Input a name exactly how it displays in the Maintained Window. \#BBBBBBExample: Time Warp Preparation\#FFFFFF \#BBBBBBExample: Bloodcoil IX\#FFFFFF
2. Apostrophes are safe! \#BBBBBBExample: Shadowknight's Furor\#FFFFFF
3. To remove a spell from being tracked, use the Delete button.
Tracked abilities are still \#FF6666limited\#FFFFFF to what is visible in the \#FF6666Maintained Window\#FFFFFF. If more than \#FF666630\#FFFFFF buffs are showing, the Spell Tracker may fail to display your desired ability.
Set effect names to be tracked by the Spell Timer window. Settings are Character-specific.

Page.Name: Effects
Page.Text: Adjust the size of Effects and Detrimental Effects icons. Settings are Character-specific.

Sliderbar.Name: EffectsSlider
Sliderbar.OnChange:
window_property unlock Custom Effects_IconSize Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Effects_IconSize.width=value window_property lock Custom Effects_IconSize
Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Effects.Volume.cellsize=value ## ',' ## value

Sliderbar.Name: DetrimentalSlider

Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.DetrimentalEffects.Volume.cellsize=value ## ',' ## value

Page.Name: CureFinder

Button.Name: Init
Button.OnShow: Parent.CheckCurse.Checked=(COND ? true : false) COND=(Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.CF_CheckCurse.Width == 2) Parent.CurseOnly.Checked=(COND ? true : false) COND=(Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.CF_CurseOnly.Width == 2) Parent.CheckGroup.Checked=(COND ? true : false) COND=(Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.CF_CheckGroup.Width == 2) Parent.CheckRaid.Checked=(COND ? true : false) COND=(Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.CF_CheckRaid.Width == 2)

Page.Text:
This is a manually triggered Cure "search" tool. It searches for the first curable detriment and casts a Cure. Group detrimentals will be searched first if Group & Raid search is on.
Settings are Character-specific.

Checkbox.Name: CheckCurse
Checkbox.OnPress: window_property unlock Custom CF_CheckCurse Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.CF_CheckCurse.Width=(COND ? 2 : 1) COND=(checked == true) window_property lock Custom CF_CheckCurse

Checkbox.Name: CurseOnly
Checkbox.OnPress: window_property unlock Custom CF_CurseOnly Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.CF_CurseOnly.Width=(COND ? 2 : 1) COND=(checked == true) window_property lock Custom CF_CurseOnly

Checkbox.Name: CheckGroup
Checkbox.OnPress: window_property unlock Custom CF_CheckGroup Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.CF_CheckGroup.Width=(COND ? 2 : 1) COND=(checked == true) window_property lock Custom CF_CheckGroup

Checkbox.Name: CheckRaid
Checkbox.OnPress: window_property unlock Custom CF_CheckRaid Parent.Parent.Parent.Parent.CF_CheckRaid.Width=(COND ? 2 : 1) COND=(checked == true) window_property lock Custom CF_CheckRaid

Page.Text: To use, make a macro with this text: /show_window Custom.DrumsUI_CF
